新疗法可改善复发/难治性急性髓系白血病的预后复发/难治性急性髓系白血病（AML），即所谓的血癌，由于抗癌药物耐药和患者器官功能脆弱，预后极差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Novel-therapy-can-improve-the-prognosis-of-relapsedrefractory-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Novel-therapy-can-improve-the-prognosis-of-relapsedrefractory-acute-myeloid-leukemia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7b23919d-2c8a-4155-98a9-38f4876e09cc Thu, 18 Jul 2024 15:38:31 -0400 Novel therapy can improve the prognosis of relapsed/refractory acute myeloid leukemia
对具有退行性 MR 的 TAVI 候选者进行分层：预后考虑因素宣布在《心血管创新与应用》杂志上发表新文章。经导管主动脉瓣植入术 (TAVI) 已成为手术风险较高的老年人群（>;75 岁）严重症状性主动脉瓣狭窄 (AS) 的主要治疗策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Stratifying-TAVI-candidates-with-dogenic-MR-Prognostic-considerations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240718/Stratifying-TAVI-candidates-with-dogenic-MR-Prognostic-considerations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38e29dc0-4bd2-468a-bea2-5a254188bf3f Thu, 18 Jul 2024 15:34:00 -0400 Stratifying TAVI candidates with degenerative MR: Prognostic considerations
